name: Gabriel Dropout
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

An angel at the top of an angel school has descended to the human world! However, she has already acclimated to the life of the human world so much that she ends up leading a self-indulgent life, skipping school all the time and being absorbed in online games. Gabriel soon forgets about her original goal to make human beings happy and has turned into a lazy and hopeless angel, or a “sloppy angel” in short. Amazingly, she swears to continue to fully enjoy the pleasure of various entertainments of the human world
about_the_game: An angel at the top of an angel school has descended to the human world! However, she has already acclimated to the life of the human world so much that she ends up leading a self-indulgent life, skipping school all the time and being absorbed in online games. Gabriel soon forgets about her original goal to make human beings happy and has turned into a lazy and hopeless angel, or a “sloppy angel” in short. Amazingly, she swears to continue to fully enjoy the pleasure of various entertainments of the human world
short_description: An angel at the top of an angel school has descended to the human world! However, she has already acclimated to the life of the human world so much that she ends up leading a self-indulgent life, skipping school all the time and being absorbed in online games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Vähintään:
  • Käyttöjärjestelmä: Windows 7
  • Prosessori: Intel Core 2 tai AMD:n vastaava
  • Muisti: 1 GB RAM
  • Verkko: Laajakaistayhteys
  • Tallennus: 200 MB kiintolevytilaa
  • Lisätietoja: 5 Mbit/s siirtonopeus 540p varten, 3 Mbit/s 360p varten.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Suositus:
  • Käyttöjärjestelmä: Windows 10
  • Prosessori: Intel Core i3+ tai AMD:n vastaavaa suositellaan HD 1080p -sisällön toistamiseen
  • Muisti: 2 GB RAM
  • Verkko: Laajakaistayhteys
  • Tallennus: 500 MB kiintolevytilaa
  • Lisätietoja: 12 Mbit/s siirtonopeus 1080p varten tai 8 Mbit/s 720p varten.
